objects.text:
• 184L Capacity - Perfect for Small Families
• 2 Star Energy Rating
• Direct-Cool Technology
• Stylish Floral Design

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE PRM 2S WINE BLOOM-Z)
product_details.description: Brand: Whirlpool. Model: 205 WDE PRM 2S. Capacity: 184 litres. Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year. Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres. Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres. Bottle Count: 6. Installation Type: Freestanding. Part Number: 72680. Form Factor: Stand Alone. Special Features: Door lock. Colour: Wine Bloom-Z. Voltage: 220. Number of Drawers: 4. Defrost System: Automatic. Door Orientation: Left. Door Material: Stainless Steel. Shelf Type: Toughened Glass. Number of Shelves: 2. Certification: Energy Rating. Material: Stainless Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd. Plot No. A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800. Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 65.1 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a single-door refrigerator on a grid-based background split into four rich, contrasting tones. The top-left quadrant houses the brand and product information with three text layers: the main title (`heading`), the subheading (`subheading`), and the product variant (`tagline`). Positioned in the center-right is a photo-realistic product image (`product_image`) of the floral-patterned fridge. Below the text header is a bulleted list (`description`) detailing product highlights. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in bold white, followed by a pink call-to-action button (`cta_background`) containing the "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`). Subtle white line accents and hazy decorative circles add softness and depth.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Maroon: `#5A0F25`
- Burgundy: `#781836`
- Dark Rose: `#4D0D20`
- Accent Pink: `#FFD8E6`
- Rich Pink: `#E96990`
- Soft Lilac: `#E9D5E0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image exhibits a rich, luxurious color palette that's ideal for a premium and elegant advertisement banner. Dominated by deep wine and violet tones (#4B003D, #5A0E4D), the background exudes sophistication. The floral artwork features a radiant blend of magenta (#C2185B), fuchsia (#F06292), coral pink (#FF6F61), and soft lavender-blue (#B39DDB), creating an ethereal contrast. Highlights are created using white accents and soft glowing centers (#FF8A80) within the petals. Colors seamlessly blend using gradient transitions, maintaining a vivid yet balanced ensemble. This high-contrast palette offers visual intensity, making the key floral designs stand out while harmonizing with the darker backdrop.
